name: Panda Runner Subway
description:
Panda Runner Subway is a free endless running game for everyone. Slide right or left to change lane, and up to jump. Play as your favorite cute panda and help lucky pandas to rush through the subway!

Features:
- Colorful & smooth 3D graphics
- Easy one-touch controls
- Amazing music and sound effects
- The original subway environment
- Simple and addictive game play
